Step 1. Convert to a basic hourly rate. Based on 40 hours per work week and 52 weeks a year, a full-time employee will work 2,080 hours per year. Divide the annual salary by 2,080 for the hourly rate for that position. For example: An annual salary of $35,000.00 divided by 2,080 = $16.83 per hour.
